org.kaaproject.kaa.client.channel

Interface KaaTransport

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BootstrapTransport, ConfigurationTransport, EventTransport, LogTransport, NotificationTransport, ProfileTransport, UserTransport
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractKaaTransport, DefaultBootstrapTransport, DefaultConfigurationTransport, DefaultEventTransport, DefaultLogTransport, DefaultNotificationTransport, DefaultProfileTransport, DefaultUserTransport

    public interface KaaTransport
    Transport interface processing request and response for the specific service.
    Author:
    Yaroslav Zeygerman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setChannelManager(KaaChannelManager channelManager)
      Sets the specific KaaChannelManager for the current transport.
      void setClientState(KaaClientState state)
      Sets the client's state object.
      void sync()
      Sends the update request to the server.
